entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
